mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_degreecertification(id, owner_id, `name`, sex, `date`, degree_conferring_unit, professional, degree_name, cert_id, `time`, files, fileshash, transaction_id, state, submit_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{userId}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{date}, #{degreeConferringUnit}, #{professional}, #{degreeName}, #{certId}, #{time}, #{files},#{fileHash}, #{transactionId}, #{state}, #{submitTime})
